# HELP postfix_connects_total Total number of times connect events were collected.
# TYPE postfix_connects_total counter
postfix_connects_total{subprogram="smtpd"} 1
# HELP postfix_disconnects_total Total number of times disconnect events were collected.
# TYPE postfix_disconnects_total counter
postfix_disconnects_total{subprogram="smtpd"} 1
# HELP postfix_lmtp_delay_seconds Delay in seconds for a LMTP server to process a message.
# TYPE postfix_lmtp_delay_seconds summary
postfix_lmtp_delay_seconds{status="sent",quantile="0.5"} 0.12
postfix_lmtp_delay_seconds{status="sent",quantile="0.9"} 0.12
postfix_lmtp_delay_seconds{status="sent",quantile="0.99"} 0.12
postfix_lmtp_delay_seconds_sum{status="sent"} 0.12
postfix_lmtp_delay_seconds_count{status="sent"} 1
# HELP postfix_lmtp_statuses_total Total number of times LMTP server message status change events were collected.
# TYPE postfix_lmtp_statuses_total counter
postfix_lmtp_statuses_total{status="sent"} 1
# HELP postfix_login_failures_total Total number of times login failure events were collected.
# TYPE postfix_login_failures_total counter
postfix_login_failures_total{method="LOGIN",subprogram="smtpd"} 1
# HELP postfix_logs_total Total number of log records processed.
# TYPE postfix_logs_total counter
postfix_logs_total{severity="error",subprogram="postscreen"} 1
postfix_logs_total{severity="info",subprogram="cleanup"} 2
postfix_logs_total{severity="info",subprogram="lmtp"} 2
postfix_logs_total{severity="info",subprogram="postscreen"} 22
postfix_logs_total{severity="info",subprogram="qmgr"} 2
postfix_logs_total{severity="info",subprogram="smtp"} 8
postfix_logs_total{severity="info",subprogram="smtpd"} 9
postfix_logs_total{severity="info",subprogram="unknown"} 1
postfix_logs_total{severity="warning",subprogram="smtpd"} 2

# TYPE postfix_lost_connections_total counter
postfix_lost_connections_total{subprogram="smtpd"} 1
# HELP postfix_milter_actions_total Total number of times milter events were collected.
# TYPE postfix_milter_actions_total counter
postfix_milter_actions_total{action="reject",subprogram="cleanup"} 1
postfix_milter_actions_total{action="reject",subprogram="smtpd"} 1
# HELP postfix_noqueue_reject_replies_total Total number of times NOQUEUE: reject event replies were collected.
# TYPE postfix_noqueue_reject_replies_total counter

postfix_noqueue_reject_replies_total{code="123",command="RCPT",enhanced_code="1.2.3",subprogram="smtpd",text="Recipient address rejected: Rejected by SPF"} 1

# TYPE postfix_not_resolved_hostnames_total counter
postfix_not_resolved_hostnames_total{subprogram="smtpd"} 1

# HELP postfix_qmgr_statuses_total Total number of times Postfix queue manager message status change events were collected.
# TYPE postfix_qmgr_statuses_total counter
postfix_qmgr_statuses_total{status="expired"} 1
# HELP postfix_smtp_delay_seconds Delay in seconds for a SMTP server to process a message.
# TYPE postfix_smtp_delay_seconds summary
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds{status="bounced",quantile="0.5"} 1.23
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds{status="bounced",quantile="0.9"} 1.23
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds{status="bounced",quantile="0.99"} 1.23
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds_sum{status="bounced"} 1.23
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds_count{status="bounced"} 1
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds{status="deferred",quantile="0.5"} 2
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds{status="deferred",quantile="0.9"} 2
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds{status="deferred",quantile="0.99"} 2
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds_sum{status="deferred"} 4
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds_count{status="deferred"} 2
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds{status="sent",quantile="0.5"} 0.12
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds{status="sent",quantile="0.9"} 0.12
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds{status="sent",quantile="0.99"} 0.12
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds_sum{status="sent"} 0.12
postfix_smtp_delay_seconds_count{status="sent"} 1
# HELP postfix_smtp_replies_total Total number of times SMTP server replies were collected.
# TYPE postfix_smtp_replies_total counter
postfix_smtp_replies_total{code="123",enhanced_code="1.2.3",text="graylist"} 1
# HELP postfix_smtp_status_replies_total Total number of times SMTP server message status change event replies were collected.
# TYPE postfix_smtp_status_replies_total counter
postfix_smtp_status_replies_total{code="123",enhanced_code="1.2.3",status="bounced",text="DKIM unauthenticated mail is prohibited, please check your DKIM signature. If you believe that this failure is in error, please refer to https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6376 or contact user@example.com for more information via alternate means."} 1
postfix_smtp_status_replies_total{code="123",enhanced_code="1.2.3",status="deferred",text="storage"} 1
# HELP postfix_smtp_statuses_total Total number of times SMTP server message status change events were collected.
# TYPE postfix_smtp_statuses_total counter
postfix_smtp_statuses_total{status="bounced"} 1
postfix_smtp_statuses_total{status="deferred"} 2
postfix_smtp_statuses_total{status="sent"} 1
# HELP postfix_unsupported_total Total number of unsupported log records.
# TYPE postfix_unsupported_total counter
postfix_unsupported_total 8
